name: 2nd International Conference on Applied Physics and Materials Science
content: We would like to invite you to attend the 2nd International Conference on Applied Physics and Materials Science. Theme: Innovative Strategies for Better Future in Physics The Purpose of the conference is to bring together Researchers and bright minds from around the Globe who are interested in Exploring the links and New Happening on Physics and Material Science. The Convention will focus on topics such as Material Science & Engineering, Nanoscience and Nanotechnology, Advanced Materials and Devices, Graphene and 2D Materials, Metals, Mining, Metallurgy and Materials, High Energy Nuclear Physics and Much More.
